3.comment: Charlie Batch went 12-of-21 for 141 yards and an interception in desperation time. Despite those meager numbers, he played pretty well considering the defense he was going up against. His first incompletion came 5 minutes into the second quarter, and he helped orchestrate a 7-minute, 93-yard touchdown drive in the 4.h quarter.
